titles.title: PROTECT Firefighters Act
PROTECT Firefighters Act
Providing Resources and Operational Training to Eliminate Crisis Threats to Firefighters Act

To direct the United States Fire Administration to develop a comprehensive strategy to improve equipment, training, and staffing standards for firefighter Rapid Intervention Teams, including those Teams that respond to port facility fires, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
